content: Any module available to convert R4 to hl7
If you mean "FHIR R4 to HL7 version 2" I suggest you ask the #v2 to FHIR stream on this forum.

@Akshay most people want to do the opposite, convert HL7V2 data to FHIR, though I can imagine for legacy reasons there might be a need to get FHIR data to interface with existing HL7v2 messaging interfaces. Not a direct answer but the Microsoft FHIR-Converter might have the tooling necessary for you to create your own conversions.

You might also check some of my old comments about how hard doing exchange model conversion is: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179188-v2-to.20FHIR/topic/Messaging.20to.20REST.20API.20conversion

Converting FHIR resources to HL7v2 segments/fields or vice versa is relatively easy. If want to connect HL7v2 message to a FHIR REST API, that is deceptively hard.
